documents.document: Nobody really cares if you're miserable, so you might as well be happy. ~Anonymous
The most important skill is anticipation. ~Greg Seker
Life is what happens to you when you’re busy making other plans. ~John Lennon
An artist in my eyes, is someone who can lighten up a dark room. ~Eric Cantona
Don’t be afraid of the space between your dreams and reality. If you can dream it, you can make it so. ~Ben Franklin
Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere. ~Martin Luther King
What you cannot see in the world is far more powerful than anything you can see. ~T. Harv Eker
Service to others is the rent you pay for your room here on earth. ~Muhammad Ali
No matter the situation, never let your emotions overpower your intelligence. ~Augie Johnston
Do what you think is right, not what people think is right. In the end, it’s you who goes through it, not them.
Life is not a having and a getting, but a being and a becoming. ~Matthew Arnold
Humans are divided between those who can still look through the eyes of youth and those who cannot. ~Dave Eggers
If hard work were such a wonderful thing, surely the rich would have kept it all to themselves. ~Joseph Lane Kirkland
When you have an inspired thought, you must trust it and act on it.
Those who speak most of illness have illness, those who speak most of prosperity have it.
In the business world, the rearview mirror is always clearer than the windshield. ~Warren Buffett
You can apologize over and over, but if your actions don’t change, the words become meaningless.
A generation of the unteachable is hanging upon us like a necklace of corpses. ~George Orwell
You will never get any more out of this life than you expect. ~Ben Sweetland
The men who can manage men manage the men who can manage only things, and the men who can manage money manage all. ~Will Durant
The true value of a human being can be found in the degree to which he has attained liberation from the self. ~Albert Einstein
If you have the courage to begin, you have the courage to succeed. ~David Viscott
Women need real moments of solitude and self-reflection to balance out how much of ourselves we give away. ~Barbara De Angelis
Your vision is the promise of what you shall one day be; your ideal is the prophecy of what you shall at last unveil. ~James Allen
A man who does not think for himself does not think at all. ~Oscar Wilde
Know or listen to those who know. ~Baltasar Gracian
There is no man living that can not do more than he thinks he can. ~Henry Ford
Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other. ~Walter Elliot
Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned. ~Peter Marshall
The first step toward success is taken when u refuse to be a captive of the environment in which u first find urself. ~Mark Caine
Don’t make excuses for why you can’t get it done. Focus on all the reasons why you must make it happen.
Quality is more important than quantity. One home run is much better than two doubles. ~Steve Jobs
Like your body your mind also gets tired so refresh it by wise sayings. ~Hazrat Ali
Do not speak in the hearing of a fool, for he will despise the wisdom of your words. ~King James Bible
Three hours a day will produce as much as a man ought to write. ~Anthony Trollope
There is no pleasure in having nothing to do; the fun is having lots to do and not doing it. ~Andrew Jackson #quote
Imagine all the people living life in peace You may say I’m a dreamer, but I’m not the only one. ~John Lennon #Quote
Success comes from knowing that you did your best to become the best that you are capable of becoming. ~John Wooden
Don’t count the days, make the days count. ~Muhammad Ali
Don’t lose hope. When the sun goes down, the stars come out.
I have deep faith that the principle of the universe will be beautiful and simple. ~Albert Einstein
Success is like reaching an important birthday and finding you're exactly the same. ~Audrey Hepburn
Your job gives you authority. Your behaviour gives you respect. ~Irwin Federman
Do not hate one another, and do not be jealous of one another, and do not desert each other. ~Bukhari #quote
A life of integrity is a life that is full of accomplishment and meaning. ~Ralph Marston
The smallest deed is better than the greatest intention. ~John Burroughs
It is not easy to find happiness in ourselves, and it is not possible to find it elsewhere. ~Agnes Repplier
Know when to cry, know when to laugh, know when to be silent. ~Mark Crow
One of the secrets of life is that all that is really worth the doing is what we do for others. ~Levi Strauss #quote
When a goal matters enough to a person, that person will find a way to accomplish what at first seemed impossible. ~Nido Qubein #quote
A secret to happiness is letting every situation be what it is instead of what you think it should be, and then making the best of it.
If you can’t be content with what you have received, be thankful for what you have escaped.
Feeling good is what you should be doing every day of your life. ~Wayne Dyer
You laugh it off, you get upset for a little while, you’re human and you let it go. ~Jennifer Lopez #quote
The less I say the more my work gets done. ~Elton John
Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage. ~Lao Tzu
We change the world not by what we say or do, but as a consequence of what we have become. ~David Hawkins #quote
The difference between a lady and a girl is not how she behaves but how she is treated. ~Audrey Hepburn #quote
I am not bound to win, but I am bound to be true. I am not bound to succeed, but I am bound to live up to what light I have. ~Abraham Lincoln #quote
It’s impossible to find someone who never hurts you, so go for the one who’s worth the pain.
What is considered impossible is just the consensus of outdated beliefs. ~Bernie Siegel
There are no wrong turnings. Only paths we had not known we were meant to walk. ~Guy Gavriel Kay
It is better to die on your feet than to live on your knees! ~Emiliano Zapata #quote
Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to an understanding of ourselves. ~Carl Jung #quote
If you can't be thankful for what you have, be thankful for what you've escaped.
Always have a positive mind and you will overcome the negative obstacles.
The world has the habit of making room for the man whose words and actions show that he knows where he is going. ~Napoleon Hill
We can change our lives. We can do, have, and be exactly what we wish. ~Tony Robbins
There is only one person who could ever make you happy, and that person is you. ~David Burns
Let’s worship Divinity, but understand the divinity we worship is beyond our comprehension. ~Sir John Templeton

Men of age object too much, consult too long, adventure too little, repent too soon, and seldom drive business home to the full period, but content themselves with a mediocrity of success. ~Dale Carnegie
An idea isn’t responsible for the people who believe in it. ~Don Marquis
Fashion passe; style is eternal. ~Yves Saint Laurent #quote
All great achievements have one thing in common - people with a passion to succeed. ~Pat Cash #quote
Obstacles are those frightful things that you see when you take your eyes off your goal. ~Henry Ford
Nothing is a waste of time if you use the experience wisely. ~Auguste Rodin
The past should be the past. It can destroy the future. Live life for what tomorrow has to offer, not for what yesterday has taken away.
One man denies the truth. Another denies his own actions. Both go into the dark. And in the next world suffer for they offend truth. ~ Buddha
It is the moment of our decisions that our destinies are created. ~Anthony Robbins #quote
Hate is not the first enemy of love. Fear is. It destroys your ability to trust.
If your happiness depends on what somebody else does, I guess you do have a problem. ~Richard Bach #quote
Decide that you want it more than you are afraid of it. ~Bill Cosby #quote
The smallest deed is better than the greatest intention. ~John Burroughs
To think is easy. To act is hard. But the hardest thing in the world is to act in accordance with your thinking. ~Johann von Goethe
All, everything that I understand, I understand only because I love. ~Leo Tolstoy #quote
Don’t compare your life to others. You have no idea what their journey is all about.
Your job gives you authority. Your behaviour gives you respect. ~Irwin Federman #quote
Don’t tell people how to do things, tell them what to do and let them surprise you with their results. ~George S Patton #quote
Competition is healthy ... but there is more to life than winning or we should nearly all be losers. ~Charles Handy
If you’re not confused, you’re not paying attention. ~Tom Peters #quote
People ask the difference between a leader and a boss. The leader leads, and the boss drives. ~Theodore Roosevelt
Exclude nothing, exaggerate nothing that is not you. The whole moon gleams in every pool. ~Fernando Pessoa
The doors we open and close each day decide the lives we live. ~Flora Whittemore #quote
Doubt is a pain too lonely to know that faith is his twin brother. ~Kahlil Gibran
The greatest good you can do for another is not just share your riches but to reveal to them their own. ~Benjamin Disraeli #quote
I don’t want perfection, I want effort. ~Unknown
Decide that wherever you are, is the best place there is. Once you start comparing, there’s no end to it. ~Sodo Yokoyama
What we have once enjoyed we can never lose. All that we love deeply becomes a part of us. ~Helen Keller #quote
If you tell the truth, you don’t have to remember anything.
Ambition has one heel nailed in well, though she stretch her fingers to touch the heavens. ~Lao Tzu #quote
